members.signatureBeforeChange: ImageData newFrame(String letter, Color color, PaletteData palette, boolean transparent, int x, int y, int width, int height, int disposalMethod, int delayTime)
members.signatureAfterChange: ImageData newFrame(String letter, Color color, boolean transparent, int x, int y, int width, int height, int disposalMethod, int delayTime)
diff: -	ImageData newFrame(String letter, Color color, PaletteData palette, boolean transparent, int x, int y, int width, int height, int disposalMethod, int delayTime) {
-		ImageData temp = new ImageData(width, height, palette.getRGBs().length, palette);
+	ImageData newFrame(String letter, Color color, boolean transparent, int x, int y, int width, int height, int disposalMethod, int delayTime) {
+		ImageData temp = new ImageData(width, height, 2, palette); // 4-color palette has depth 2
-	/* Photon does not support 1 & 2-bit images. Convert to 4-bit image. */
-		ImageData img = new ImageData(i.width, i.height, 4, i.palette);
+	* Feature in Photon. Photon does not support 2-bit depth images and
+	* memory contexts can not be created on 1 & 4-bit depth images.  The
+	* fix is to create 8-bit depth images instead.
+		ImageData img = new ImageData(i.width, i.height, 8, i.palette);
